name: Flappy Word
description:
Flappy Word is a Flappy Bird style typing game created for the Flappy Jam.  Test your typing skills and try and achieve a high score!

Download the .zip and extract to play.

Created by Richard Sedgwick

Additional Credits:

Music--"Egmont Overture Finale" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
